Detailed Description

A Panel is instanciated by each application to show the state of its currently focused window. Per default the softkey-actions of the focused window are synchronized with the panel, so that the panel is responsible for showing the softkey-actions, whereas the window acts as container for the softkey-actions. See also Application::CreatePanel for informations how to instanciate an extended panel.

void Panel::SetOwner (  Window *  owner  )  [inline]
 

Sets the owner of the panel, which usually is the top level window of an application. It should not be necessary to adjust the owner manually, as this is done internally inside APOXI already.
